title: Geography Quiz App
description: A full-stack web application for testing and improving your geography knowledge through interactive quizzes.

title: Photo Booth
description: A motion-activated Raspberry Pi photo booth with a Django backend, real-time hardware control, and automated photo delivery via AWS S3 and email.

title: Movie Recommendations
description: An AI-powered movie app that recommends films based on your mood, complete with trailers and key details.
